channel.title: Client Auto Patcher + Auto Patcher Server + Setup Guide All In One
channel.description:
[u][b]Auto Patcher Guide.[/b][/u]
[b]1. add your host name in play.ini and then run 'Refresh Patcher Ip' this will add your host name to the auto patcher. 2. add your ip address in the AutoPatch.dat file DO NOT CHANGE THE PORT. 3. change the name of your run.bat in your client to play.bat 4. in the ini folder change the ip address in the oem files to your ip address.[/b] [b]5. all auto patcher files go in the client.[/b] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?n5zw2yibhg4]http://www.mediafire.com/?n5zw2yibhg4[/url] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
[u][b]Auto Patcher Server Guide.[/b][/u]
give me a bit for Auto Patcher Server Guide and upload of patcher server im still editing the server.
[u][b]70% Done[/b][/u] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
[u]t[b]ell me if there is any bugs ill fix[/b][/u]
Image: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dj9sls.jpg[/img]

item.title: Client Auto Patcher + Auto Patcher Server + Setup Guide All In One
item.dc:creator: @EudemonEgg EudemonEgg
item.description:
@EudemonEgg wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:10, topic:331842”]How would it be used though? Like, do you put your server files on a webpage and edit them and put the webpage as the hostname in the play.ini file?[/quote]there is the auto patcher and the auto patcher server i released the auto patcher only. im still fixing some stuff on the auto patcher server then ill release that with a guide the auto patcher connects to the auto patcher server to see if there is a update and if there is the auto patcher then patches the client. the client files that you want sent to the client would be added on a host and then add the host or ip in the play.ini

Read full topic

item.title: Client Auto Patcher + Auto Patcher Server + Setup Guide All In One
item.dc:creator: @EudemonEgg EudemonEgg
item.description:
@EudemonEgg wrote:

Auto Patcher Guide.

1. add your host name in play.ini and then run ‘Refresh Patcher Ip’ this will add your host name to the auto patcher.
2. add your ip address in the AutoPatch.dat file DO NOT CHANGE THE PORT.
3. change the name of your run.bat in your client to play.bat
4. in the ini folder change the ip address in the oem files to your ip address.
5. all auto patcher files go in the client.

Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?n5zw2yibhg4

Auto Patcher Server Guide.

give me a bit for Auto Patcher Server Guide and upload of patcher server im still editing the server.

70% Done

tell me if there is any bugs ill fix

Image:

Read full topic
